name: Zombread
description: This game was made for the DAMI Game Jam! (the theme is memory)  Play as zombread as you complete difficult level's that test your skills, there is a twist... You have to complete each level twice, when you beat it for the second time, all you will see is the player and the platforms will be invisible. You have to use your "memory" of the level with visible platform's in order to make it to the end without knowing where the platform's are! Enjoy!
